entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight then southwest 40 gusting to 70. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
